TopicTitle: Launch Stability Enhancer - Mount In Booster Exhaust Vent?

Articles.Content:
I've seen screenshots and videos in the past where the launch stability enhancers were mounted in the rocket exhaust vent, but I can't figure out how to do this ... I've tried rotating it every which way and I can't see to make it mount anywhere but radial.

Any help here would be much appreciated!

Edited July 7, 2013 by Caelib

Well I did it a few times, The way I did it was to flip my rocket to the side 90deg, mount the launch clam in the exhaust vent then reset the rocket to it'S original orientation and the launch clamp would follow.
Change the camera angle so that you can place it radially underneath the booster.

Perfect -- worked great! Thanks everyone for their input!

Edited July 7, 2013 by Caelib
